name: Issho ni Gohan Portable: Apartment Dinner Show
overview: In order to take over the restaurant her family owns in the countryside the protagonist 'Mugibata Akane' enrolls into the 'Hanarenzaku Cooking University'. Not being able to live on her meager allowance she goes out in the city to look for a part-time job. She looks so hard she's at the point of collapsing, but then a certain person saves her on one condition. That condition is that she must become the landlady of the student apartment building the 'Meshikessou'. Will she be able to properly perform the duties? And why are the boarders all so individual!
